'Potassium nitrate' is a chemical compound with the formula KNO 3. It
is an ionic salt of potassium ions K + and nitrate ions
NO 3â .

It occurs as a mineral niter and is a natural solid source of nitrogen.
Potassium nitrate is one of several nitrogen-containing compounds collectively
referred to as saltpeter.

Major uses of potassium nitrate are in fertilizers, food additive, rocket
propellants and fireworks; it is one of the constituents of gunpowder.
